This game has a lot of issues, lots of bugs and a toxic community but it's a very unique game. No two matches will be the same and the devs have been consistently(kind of) rolling out new content since the launch of the game. I absolutely adore this game

I really enjoy playing this game. Most of the time I play survivor because I'm not very good at playing killer, but killer is also pretty fun. 

However, there are toxic players every now and then. Face camping killers, t-bagging and very annoying survivors. But besides that it's a very great game. New content is added often so it doesn't get boring. I totally recommend this game.

the new update redid some textures and the game looks better now, they also added a new system to get rewards. the game has always been pretty fun with friends, or even with randoms, but the fact they listen to the community and work on it so often really makes it worth playing.

This game completely SUX! - i wanna be the damn killer,  just once, just freaking once would be nice, i've had the game for over a week. Every time i log in, i cannot be killer it just says - searching for a match. 
Bored being cut down by OBVIOUS cheaters who seem to know exactly where u are at all times, this game is ridiculous, i've yet to have a single game where i've actually been able to start a single generator and have NEVER been in a game where any have escaped. The killers are way OP  and as yet have not even been able to find a single match as the killer. WASTE OF MONEY! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY on this game peope!

This game is very fun. Sure, there's a large quantity of toxic players, but you run into that in any competitive game. People will always complain about balance, but it's in the best state that it's been in since release. If you're considering buying it, definitely go for it when it's on sale.

Absolutely love this game. One of my favorite games ever.

Its a fun game, if a little buggy at times. A nice steady flow of new content certainly helps keep the player base engaged, and the Xbox 360 level graphics give it a classic feel. Matchmaking is a little broken, so don't get discouraged if you get completely destroyed your first couple of games. Keep practicing, once you get the hang of the game it's hours of fun at a time.

Mierda de juego que solo ayuda a los supervivientes,  en la cual castiga al killer  en todo momento. No os gasteis  vuestro dinero en este juego y en ningu dlc. Invertir tiempo en este juego es perdida de tiempo y no obtendras diversion alguna, solo para que al fina juegues de forma guarra como killer. Hacerme caso estais a tiempo de ahorraros tiempo y dinero en esta perdida de tiempo llamado dbd. Que tengais un buen dia

luv it

This game is super fun solo or with friends! It really shines when you play with friends, like most multiplayer games, but it's fun to play on your own.
Especially now with the new rift and archives, it gives you more stuff to try to accomplish, which is the main issue with the game. There's only one real objective each game, finish the generators. Adding the archives essentially added new objectives for players, which helps keep the game feeling varied!
Also, so many awesome killers! : >

This game is amazing! It's really a work of art honestly the way they make killers so useful all in there own ways is amazing. There is a killer for every play style. The only thing bad is the hitboxes I mean they are just busted
